summary.span: 提供了一组可帮助你调试代码的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help debug your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用 类中的方法来打印调试信息，并使用断言检查逻辑，则可以使代码更可靠，而不会影响发运产品的性能和代码大小。If you use methods in the class to print debugging information and check your logic with assertions, you can make your code more robust without impacting the performance and code size of your shipping product. 此类提供用于显示 对话框的方法，并发出将始终失败的断言。This class provides methods to display an dialog box, and to emit an assertion that will always fail. 此类提供以下变体中的写入方法： 、、 和 。This class provides write methods in the following variations: , , and . 和 类提供动态控制跟踪输出的方式。The and classes provide means to dynamically control the tracing output. 您可以修改这些开关的值，而无需重新编译应用程序。You can modify the values of these switches without recompiling your application. 有关使用配置文件设置开关的信息，请参阅 类和[跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)主题。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see the class and the [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md) topic. 您可以通过将 实例添加到 集合或从中删除实例来自定义跟踪输出的目标。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding instances to or removing instances from the collection. 集合由 和 类共享;将跟踪侦听器添加到任一类会将侦听器添加到这两个类中。The collection is shared by both the and the classes; adding a trace listener to either class adds the listener to both. 默认情况下， 类发出跟踪输出。By default, the class emits trace output. > [!NOTE] > 如果跟踪侦听器使用的资源不可用，则在跟踪时将跟踪侦听器添加到 集合可能导致引发异常。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 条件和引发的异常依赖于跟踪侦听器，在本主题中无法枚举。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 将对 方法的调用放在 `try`/`catch` 块以检测和处理跟踪侦听器中的任何异常时，可能会很有用。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. 您可以使用 方法或 属性修改缩进级别。You can modify the level of indentation using the method or the property. 若要修改缩进间距，请使用 属性。To modify the indent spacing, use the property. 您可以指定是否在每次写入后自动刷新输出缓冲区，方法是将 属性设置为 `true`。You can specify whether to automatically flush the output buffer after each write by setting the property to `true`. 若要设置 的 和 ，你可以编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To set the and for , you can edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application. 应设置配置文件的格式，如以下示例中所示。The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example. ```xml ``` 特性应用于 的方法。The attribute is applied to the methods of . 支持 忽略对这些方法的调用的编译器，除非将 "DEBUG" 定义为条件编译符号。Compilers that support ignore calls to these methods unless "DEBUG" is defined as a conditional compilation symbol. 请参阅编译器的文档，确定是否支持 以及用于定义条件编译符号的语法。Refer to a compiler's documentation to determine whether is supported and the syntax for defining a conditional compilation symbol. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio C#和 Visual Basic 项目中，默认情况下，为调试版本定义 "debug" 条件编译符号，同时为调试版本和发布版本定义 "TRACE" 符号。In Visual Studio C# and Visual Basic projects, by default, the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol is defined for debug builds, and the "TRACE" symbol is defined for both debug and release builds. 有关如何禁用此行为的信息，请参阅 Visual Studio 文档。For information about how to disable this behavior, see the Visual Studio documentation. 有关 Visual C++中的条件调试的信息，请参阅[DebugC++类（/cli）](/cpp/dotnet/debug-class-cpp-cli)。For information about conditional debugging in Visual C++, see [Debug Class (C++/CLI)](/cpp/dotnet/debug-class-cpp-cli). 若要在中C#定义 "调试" 条件编译符号，请在使用命令行编译代码时将 `/d:DEBUG` 选项添加到编译器命令行，或将 `#define DEBUG` 添加到文件的顶部。To define the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` option to the compiler command line when you compile your code using a command line, or add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，将 `/d:DEBUG=True` 选项添加到编译器命令行或将 `#Const DEBUG=True` 添加到文件。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` option to the compiler command line or add `#Const DEBUG=True` to the file. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 来指示程序执行的开始和结束。The following example uses to indicate the beginning and end of a program's execution. 该示例还使用 和 来区分跟踪输出。The example also uses and to distinguish the tracing output. [!code-cpp[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 方法仅适用于调试版本。By default, the method works only in debug builds. 如果要在发布版本中进行断言，请使用 方法。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管代码中的断言](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). > [!IMPORTANT] > `Assert` 方法对 [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] 应用不可用。The `Assert` methods are not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps. 通常， 方法用于标识程序开发过程中的逻辑错误。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 计算条件。 evaluates the condition. 如果结果为 `false`，它会向 集合发送失败消息。If the result is `false`, it sends a failure message to the collection. 您可以通过向 集合添加 或从中删除一个来自定义此行为。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 当应用程序在用户界面模式下运行时，它将显示一个消息框，其中显示带有文件和行号的调用堆栈。When the application runs in user interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 消息框包含三个按钮： "**中止**"、"**重试**" 和 "**忽略**"。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 单击 "**中止**" 按钮将终止应用程序。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 如果你的应用程序在调试器中运行，则单击 "**重试**" 会将你发送到调试器中的代码，如果不是，则单击 "提供" 以打开调试器。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 单击 "**忽略**" 将继续执行代码中的下一个指令。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用不支持模式对话框，因此它们在用户界面模式和非用户界面模式下的行为相同。apps do not support modal dialog boxes, so they behave the same in user interface mode and non-user interface mode. 在调试模式下将消息写入活动跟踪侦听器，否则不会以发布模式编写消息。The message is written to the active trace listeners in debugging mode, or no message is written in release mode. > [!NOTE] > 消息框的显示取决于是否存在 。The display of the message box depends on the presence of the . 如果 不在 集合中，则不会显示消息框。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以通过[<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)、 [<删除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)或对 属性（）调用`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`方法来删除。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 你可以在配置文件中更改与你的应用程序名称对应的 的行为。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，您可以启用和禁用断言消息框或设置 属性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 配置文件的格式应如下所示：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例为数组创建一个索引，执行某些操作以设置索引的值，然后调用 以确认索引值是否有效。The following example creates an index for an array, performs some action to set the value of the index, and then calls to confirm that the index value is valid. 如果无效，则 输出调用堆栈。If it is not valid, outputs the call stack. [!code-cpp[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用[.net 复合格式设置功能](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)将对象的值转换为其文本表示形式，并将该表示形式嵌入到字符串中。This method uses the [.NET composite formatting feature](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md) to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 生成的字符串将发送到 集合。The resulting string is sent to the collection. 默认情况下， 方法仅适用于调试版本。By default, the method works only in debug builds. 如果要在发布版本中进行断言，请使用 方法。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管代码中的断言](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). 通常， 如果你的应用程序在调试器中运行，则单击 "**重试**" 会将你发送到调试器中的代码，如果不是，则单击 "提供" 以打开调试器。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 单击 "**忽略**" 将继续执行代码中的下一个指令。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > 消息框的显示取决于是否存在 。The display of the message box is dependent on the presence of the
